paragraphs: My creative nature makes me a passionate front-end developer. I have a good feeling for UX, UI and Animations and an eye for pixel perfection. With attention to detail, i create things that come to life.
I put my analytical and technical character into practice in backend development. I enjoy designing and implementing software architectures and solving complex problems.

about.headline: About me
paragraphs: I am Christoph, born 1990, live near D端sseldorf, Germany, working as a web developer since 2012. I worked for Me & Company in D端sseldorf, initially alongside my media informatics studies (well, i actually studied part-time :D) and full-time since 2017. Until i became a full-time freelancer at the end of 2022

Besides from coding, I live out my creative nature as a bass player in a band. I absolutely love cycling and traveling by bike (bikepacking). I challenge me with triathlons. I like to play video games, especially indie games.
